results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Man with lantern, woman standing by baby’s bassinet and seated man.
Narrative for slide “He revived her and led her home, where she was astonished and overjoyed to find her husband
‘sav´d in that fearful hour By his wife’s brave deed and trust in need in Heaven’s all gracious power”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Man with lantern standing by collapsed woman.
Narrative for slide “The scene faded and its place was taken by the belfry interior dominated by the large figure of the sexton, his face buried in false whiskers, bending over Jane’s unconscious form.”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Harry Conquest with his head in his hands by baby’s bassinet.
Narrative for slide “…….and poor Harry sank fainting beside the cold hearth and his dying son.”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Man entering house in snow.
Narrative for slide “Harry Conquest was among those brought off the burning ship, and he was seen making his feeble way, his clothes all scorched and rent, amid overhanging crags, to his snowbound cottage.”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Two figures looking over cliff side to windswept sea and row boat.
Narrative for slide “…… until the image of a lifeboat plunging through the breakers showed that help was near and the reciter confirmed that the rescuers
´O´ercame each check and reached the wreck and saved the hapless crew.’”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Woman kneeling below church window, hand to head.
Narrative for slide “The clamour of an actual bell deafened the Kettering audience, ringing on and on……..”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Woman standing looking out church window.
Narrative for slide “Unable to open the heavy door, Jane climbed through a window, reached the belfry, and grasped the rope, ‘sole cord of hope’.”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Title slide.
Narrative for slide “‘Twas about the time of Christmas and many years ago,
When the sky was black with wrath and rack, and the earth was white with snow,
When loudly rang the tumult of winds and waves at strife,
In her house by the sea with her child on her knee, sat Harry Conquest’s wife.”

results.title: Mots' Mansion [videogame trailer]
results.brief_description: Special Mention in the Middle Videogame category. Sam, Bec and their Mother move in to Grandma’s house. But when Bec is captured, Sam needs to complete tasks given to him by the mysterious MOTS. Can he trust the Man on the Stairs and will they both make it out. In the end, the choices you make will matter.

results.title: The Adventures of the Lost Treasure [videogame trailer]
results.brief_description: Winner in the Senior Videogame category. A choose your own adventure style game where you have to, you know, find treasure and stuff … and not die.
